product_name: The North Face TKA 100 Microvelour Pants - Men's - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Lounge around the campfire or fireplace in these supersoft fleece pants. Luxurious to the touch, the microvelour is also more thermally efficient than the original TKA 100 microfleece.
short_description: Lounge around the campfire or fireplace in these supersoft fleece pants. Luxurious to the touch, the microvelour is also more thermally efficient than the original TKA 100 microfleece.
